options.title: Only Pay for electricity that you use
options.text: You'll only pay for the electricity that you use at a fixed cost rate. We will source a Financier for your system on your behalf.

options.title: Buy the whole system, never pay electricity again.
options.text: Buy the whole system and never pay for electricity again.

options.title: Residential
options.text: Home Address small property with lower consumption.

options.title: Agriculture
options.text: Energy System distributed over a large property with multiple points of consumption.

options.title: Industrial
options.text: Single or Multi Manufacturing or industrial business needs electricity. High Demand.

options.title: Commercial
options.text: Large Consumption requirement and your own private distribution network

consumer-type-residential.title: Do you own, or rent this property?

options.title: Home Owner
options.text: If you are the owner of the property where you require Power Panels.

options.title: Tenant / Renting
options.text: If you are Renting or are a Tenant at the property where Power Panels are required.

consumer-type-agriculture.title: How would you like to provide your information?

options.title: Manually provide details
options.text: Manually provide required information by answering a few short questions.

options.title: Request a call back
options.text: A sales person will call you to discuss electricity requirements.

options.title: Multiple Sites

options.title: International
options.text: For clients that require a solution outside the borders of South Africa
